I want you to create the following workflow. I have @resources/ where I have my cv and my template for cover letter. I want you to create the following workflow. 
I want a slash command create it here in .claude/... that will start the process of applying to jobs. The arguments for this slash command will be a url of a job application website. There the agent shall use the playwright mcp tool to search the website for jobs that match the cv inside the resources. When a job is found then the agent should create a subagent that will
- search for the company and collect info
- take the template cover letter and create a good cover letter for that company

After that return to the primary agent and the primary agent shall fill out the fields and attach documents in the website in order to completely apply. The primary agent shall not stop until it has done 10 job applications in that website. 

Here is documentation on how to configure claude in this dir to achieve that. You shall create claude configuration of subagent and slash command proomtp to achieve this workflow.
